title: The Very Moment That COMPLETELY Lost The Debate For Bernie Sanders Against Ted Cruz

organizations.name: debate for bernie sanders against ted cruz

text:
The Very Moment That COMPLETELY Lost The Debate For Bernie Sanders Against Ted Cruz 0 shares   
Last night, Bernie Sanders and Ted Cruz went on CNN for an Obamacare debate. 
Ted absolutely crushed it while Bernie didn’t exactly look good. 
At one point, Bernie started lecturing a small business owner for not being able to afford the cost of Obamacare for her employees. 
It was hard to watch. 
Here’s the video…
